content:
I'm so glad you're excited about the idea! Including thank-you cards or drawings with the sandwiches is a thoughtful gesture that can have a profound impact on the recipients. It's a beautiful way to show that the kids care about the people they're helping and are thinking of them.

By incorporating this activity into your event, you're not only providing a meal, but also a sense of connection and community. It's a wonderful way to teach the kids about the importance of empathy, kindness, and gratitude, and it will surely be a memorable experience for everyone involved.

Remember to encourage the kids to be creative and have fun with the activity. It's not about creating a perfect drawing or writing a perfect message, but about showing that they care. And who knows, the recipients might even keep the cards or drawings as a reminder of the kind gesture and the impact it had on their day.

I'm thrilled to see how your event is shaping up, and I'm confident that it will be a huge success. If you have any more questions or need any further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and the kids all the best for your event, and I hope it's a wonderful experience for everyone involved!
